posts.post_title: SOLD -SGC Graded T206s, Polar Bear - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Scans provided are prior to being encapsulated.  If you need a picture of the card in the case I can provide them, but these scans show the card better so that is what I am providing.  The grades are listed below the card picture with the price.

I will take them all, pm sent.
Best,
Jeff
